#1
``` {r num1}
vectorA <- 1:5
matrixA <- matrix(0, 5, 5)

for (i in 1:5) {
  for (j in 1:5) {
    matrixA[i,j] <- abs(i-j)
  }
}

print(matrixA)
```

#2
``` {r num2}
# Use for loop to print * string
for (i in 1:5) {
  for (j in 1:i) {
    cat("* ")
  }
  cat("\n")
}
```


#3
``` {r num3}
n <- as.integer(readline(prompt = "Enter a number to start the Fibonacci sequence: "))

a <- 0
b <- 1

repeat {
  fib <- a + b
  if (fib > 500) {
    break
  }
  if (a >= n) {
    cat(a, " ")
  }
  a <- b
  b <- fib
}
```
